Reference

All functions

add_aggregationTree_information() add_aggregationTree_information_toStudyTree()

Add information from an aggregation tree to a study tree

apply_graph_theme()

Apply multiple DiagrammeR global graph attributes

base30toNumeric() numericToBase30()

Conversion between base10 and base30

cat0()

Concatenate to screen without spaces

cloneStudiesObject()

Clone a parsed Rxs object (a 'studies object')

countryCodeList()

Return a list of country codes

defaultGraphTheme()

Get default graph theme from options

duplicate_sources()

Detect duplicate sources

explode_vector_to_values()

Explode a vector to values

extract_doi()

Extract DOI(s) from a character vector

flattenStudies_to_wideDf()

Flatten all studies to a wide data frame (somewhat brutally)

heatMap_from_freqTab() heatMap_from_studies()

Produce a heatmap from a frequency table

get_singleValue_fromTree() get_singleValue_fromTreeList() get_singleValue()

Get a single value from a study tree, list of trees, or studies object

get_valueList_asDf_fromStudyTree() get_valueList_asDf()

Get a value list as data frame from a study tree, list of trees, or studies object

`%IN%`

Case insensitive version of %in%

studies_matchingUniqueEntityIdentifiers() studyTree_matchingUniqueEntityIdentifiers()

Look for all entity identifiers that a given pattern

maximizeMatrices() maximizeMatrix()

Adding columns or rows to a matrix

messy_df_to_tree()

Convert a potentially messy 'network data frame' to a data.tree

opts

Options for the metabefor package

padVectors()

In a list of vectors, pad short vectors

rxs_partial() knit_print(<rxs>) print(<rxs>)

Printing a tree of R extraction scripts

query_conceptTerms() print(<mbf_query_conceptTerms>) query_full() print(<mbf_query_full>) query_requiredConcepts() print(<mbf_query_requiredConcepts>) query_toInterfaceLang() print(<mbf_query_toInterfaceLang>)

Building queries

rbind_dfs()

Simple alternative for rbind.fill or bind_rows

rbind_df_list()

Bind lots of dataframes together rowwise

read_aggregationTree_from_gs()

Read an aggregation tree from a Google Sheets URL

renderTreeAsGraph()

Render a tree as a graph

repeatStr()

Repeat a string a number of times

rxs_buildTemplate()

Title

rxs_fromSpecifications()

Title

rxs_parseExtractionScripts()

Read and parse the extraction scripts in a directory

rxs_parseSpecifications()

Parse Rxs (R extraction script) specifications

rxs_validation()

Validate a study tree

sanitize_for_DiagrammeR()

Sanitize for DiagrammeR

specify_search()

Specify a search

splitVectors()

In a list of vectors, split vectors to multiple list elements

studies_to_freqTab() studyTreeList_to_freqTab() studyTree_to_freqTab()

Create a frequency table from a list of study trees

studyTree_has_entity()

Check whether a study tree has an entity

studyTree_to_valueDf()

Create a long ('tidy') data frame with the full study tree

supplementDefaultGraphTheme()

Supplement / edit the default graph theme

supplement_data_from_list_inSingleNode() supplement_data_from_list_inStudyTrees() supplement_data_from_lists()

Supplement a target entitity node with clustered entity values from another entity node

supplement_data_with_value_inSingleNode() supplement_data_with_value_inStudyTrees()

Supplement a target entitity node with a value from another entity node

supplement_studyTrees_from_txs()

Supplement a parsed studies object with entities from a tabulated extraction spreadsheet (txs) specification

tidy_studyTree() tidy_studyTrees()

Flatten one or more study trees into a tidy data frame

transform_entityValue()

Perform a transformation selectively

transform_in_every_clusteringEntity()

Perform a transformation for every clustering entity

studies_vectorValue_to_valueList() studyTreeList_vectorValue_to_valueList() studyTree_vectorValue_to_valueList() vectorValue_to_valueList()

In an entity, convert a vector to a value list

vecTxt() vecTxtQ()

Easily parse a vector into a character value

wrapVector()

Wrap all elements in a vector

write_JabRef_Config()

Write a JabRef configuration file

write_screenerPackage()

Write a 'screener package' to disk
